testcase.name: validate_response_header

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "etag" was not "cd88b7bed603f30adc006fd86f059fcf", was "b53a4ed60e6b6ef47a3d93184446abd2". Headers are: date=Thu, 17 Mar 2022 15:01:31 GMT content-type=application/json; Charset=UTF-8 transfer-encoding=chunked x-apilayer-transaction-id=5be5908c-be0d-4c84-80e8-8d62dae5d9b2 access-control-allow-methods=GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, OPTIONS last-modified=Thu, 17 Mar 2022 14:18:03 GMT etag=b53a4ed60e6b6ef47a3d93184446abd2 access-control-allow-origin=* x-request-time=0.010
